channel.title: Rpi on Krishna Venkata's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rpi on Krishna Venkata's Blog

item.title: Build and Deploy Kubernetes Hashicorp Vault
item.description: Goal Vault is aiming at improving security of the containers by rotating token and credential much more often than usual. Looks like it is especially effectiv to help rotate passwords used to access internal databases. Key Aspects Compile and deploy the vault code in vault Deploy WIP Conclusion WIP Reference Links Official HashiCorp Code

item.title: Ansible Meetup
item.description: Topics that will be covered Introduction to Ansible. Overview of Ansible Architecture and Basic modules. Overview and demo of Ansible Tower. Ansible in Real Life. Pros and Cons of Ansible vs Other Configuration management tools. Workshop Goal Get Hands on Ansible playbooks and know Ansible Tower Deploy Coming Soon Conclusion Coming Soon
